p: Patients received forodesine for a median of 2.1 months (range, 0.2–36.0 months). Seventeen patients (35%) had a delay in forodesine dosing because of AEs, but only one patient (2%) had a dose reduction to 200 mg twice-daily (because of pneumonia). The mean daily dose of forodesine was 586.7 mg (standard deviation ± 37.2 mg).
